message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value, I believe it's worth more than $80 to you. Let's start our negotiation at $100. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm only willing to pay $90 at this point. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose an alternative. How about we meet in the middle at $95? I hope this proposal works for you.
